title: Fidget cube
body: ![](/medias/1.png) ### Context School project, we choose to make a pomotional landing page for the Fidget cube. We wanted to stand out by using 3D techonologies such as WebGL. ![](/medias/2.jpg) ### Technical That was the first time i tried WebGL, and it wasn't a piece of cake ! - Build with Three.js. - Some Threex plugins. ![](/medias/3.jpg) ![](/medias/4.jpg)

meta.summary: Clean interface and WebGL. The Fidget cube is an unusually addicting, high-quality desk toy designed to help you focus.
